title: LFT - ADC/MID - Diamond
body:
Posting on a throwaway acc, looking for a team to join as either adc or mid

I have a huge pool for both adc and mid and i'm currently d5 on main and my smurf is plat im trying to climb my smurf up to diamond as well and then start my diamond climb to hopefully masters/chall by end of season.

I also have team experience behind me and I know a lot people in the industry, I have quite a lot of people who can vouch for me and will want to scrim with me and whatever team I join :)

I pref adc but love playing mid too so either works, please add "Doublelift#2714" on discord, thanks :)
or comment here and ill add you in league(I wont be on this league account)

Thanks,

replies.body: Hey I need a Mid/ADC for a Plat V+ team looking to work towards OOL. Team currently has Myself (P5) and a (D5) Support.
Hey im gold two and im looking to climb, could do so with you on your platinum account. add me or ill add you :)
